Test Name: Antineuronal Nuclear Antibody Type 3 (ANNA-3) Titer, Serum
Purpose: To quantitatively determine ANNA-3 antibody titers in serum for assisting in the diagnosis and management of neurologic diseases.
Container: Red-top tube or Serum Separator Tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA reader (or immunofluorescence microscope), micropipettes, incubator
